item.title: Posting into the void – with guardrails
item.description: A LinkedIn post with little traction led to a surprising AI collaboration – proof that sharing online can spark unexpected opportunities.

item.title: Data, AI, humans, and climate: Carving a consulting niche
item.description: Podcast chat on the reality of Data & AI and my consulting focus: Helping climate & nature tech startups ship data-intensive solutions.

item.title: Juggling delivery, admin, and leads: Monthly biz recap
item.description: Highlights and lessons from my solo expertise biz, including value pricing, fractional cash flow, and distractions from admin & politics.

item.title: Keep learning: Your career is never truly done
item.description: Podcast chat on my career journey from software engineering to data science and independent consulting.

item.title: First year lessons from a solo expertise biz in Data & AI
item.description: Reflections on building a solo expertise business in Data & AI, focusing on climate tech startups. Lessons learned from the first year of transition.

item.title: AI/ML lifecycle models versus real-world mess
item.description: The real world of AI/ML doesn’t fit into a neat diagram, so I created another diagram and a maturity heatmap to model the mess.

item.title: Mentorship and the art of actionable advice
item.description: Reflections on what it takes to package expertise and deliver timely, actionable advice outside the context of employee relationships.
